body: Downgrading back to 3.12.3, it starts working again as expected (updates going through without having such an exception).

Thanks for reporting.

I assume you mean `3.13` and not `1.13`, correct?

> Thanks for reporting.
> 
> I assume you mean `3.13` and not `1.13`, correct?

Yeap, its 3.13 (and 3.12 is working).

rename.from: JPA writes don't work when using ONLY named data sources since 1.13.0
rename.to: JPA writes don't work when using ONLY named data sources since 3.13.0

body: @krisztiankocsis can you provide the full stacktrace?
Also it would help if you could assemble a small reproducer so that we could reproduce the issue easily.
Maybe the issue is with the non-managed thread, and not the multiple data sources.
